<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It has survived long enough for the copyright,expire and the book,enter the public domain. A public domain book is one that was never subject<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">to copyright or whose legal copyright term has expired. Whether a book is in the public domain may vary country,country. Public domain books<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">are our gateways,the past, representing a wealth of history, culture and knowledge that's often difficult,discover.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">publisher,a library and finally,you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Google is proud,partner with libraries,digitize public domain materials and make them widely accessible. Public domain books belong,the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">public and we are merely their custodians. Nevertheless, this work is expensive, so in order,keep providing this resource, we have taken steps to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">translation, optical character recognition or other areas where access,a large amount of text is helpful, please contact us. We encourage the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">use of public domain materials for these purposes and may be able,help.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
